english: Poverty in itself does not make men into a rabble .
chinese: 贫困自身并不能使人成为贱民。

english: His gruff father warned, "don't bring home an okinawan or an eta. "
chinese: 治家严格的父亲嘱咐说：“不能带冲绳人或者贱民进家。”

english: Gandhi established another ashram and calmly declared that he welcomed: untouchables !
chinese: 甘地又创办了一个静修院并镇静地宣布：欢迎贱民。

english: Our not remote ancestors held the right of life and death over the surrounding vulgar .
chinese: 过去不远，我们的祖先对于周围贱民曾经掌握过生杀之权。

english: Boom ! after six years of being a pariah ,
chinese: 在当了六年的贱民之后
贱民造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His gruff father warned , " don ' t bring home an okinawan or an eta .
chinese: 治家严格的父亲嘱咐说： “不能带冲绳人或者贱民进家。 ”

english: The untouchables have been struggling for their rights constantly , but with little effect
chinese: 贱民中多数人为农村的贪雇农。

english: By virtue of birth , some castes inherit wealth ; the dalits inherit debt
chinese: 由于出生不同，有些种姓继承财富；贱民则背负一身债。

english: Because of me , you have to be demoted to be a lowly peasant . is it fine with you
chinese: 因为我，也许你会被贬为贱民，这样也没关系吗？

english: A member of a low caste of agricultural and domestic workers in southern india and burma
chinese: 贱民，下等人在南印度和缅甸从事农业和家务劳动的低等阶层的成员

english: " they abuse us as they always do , " cried out rajender , a 40 - year - old dalit trash collector . " we hear india is booming
chinese: 他们像过去那样践踏我们， 40岁的贱民清洁工拉金德呐喊。

english: Although the untouchable system was abolished after india gained her independence , it still exists in reality
chinese: 印度独立后虽在法律上废除?民制，但实际上仍存在，种姓间成见很深，一亿多贱民仍被歧视。

english: Critics say that such statements are simply meant to garner votes from lower castes and that any gains made by dalits have been marginal
chinese: 论者指这类陈述，只是为了向下层阶级拉选票，贱民根本得不到什麽好处。

english: Mr bashir ' s inflammatory rhetoric and often mulish resistance to humanitarian pleading have made sudan a pariah , at least in the west
chinese: 巴希尔先生的花言巧语和对人道主义谴责的顽固辩解使苏丹成为国际社会至少在西方的一个贱民。

english: Besides , there are 22 " madhesi " ( inhabitants of the eastern terai ) , 11 dalits , and 22 from the indigenous groups also among the 73 maoist mps
chinese: 另外，有22名麦德锡人（特莱平原东部的居民） ， 11名议员出身贱民阶层， 22名议员出身于原住民家庭。
